alert.note: Alert for Hardeman; Wilbarger (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 11 at 9:26PM CDT until August 11 at 10:15PM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Norman has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Jackson County in southwestern Oklahoma... South central Kiowa County in southwestern Oklahoma... Northwestern Tillman County in southwestern Oklahoma... Southeastern Harmon County in southwestern Oklahoma... Northwestern Wilbarger County in northern Texas... Northeastern Hardeman County in northern Texas... * Until 1015 PM CDT. * At 926 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Headrick to 5 miles south of Humphreys to 4 miles west of Odell to 7 miles south of Gould, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Altus, Frederick, Snyder, Tipton, Olustee, Eldorado, Mountain Park, Manitou, Martha, Gould, Elmer, Headrick, Friendship, Altus Air Force Base, Tom Steed Reservoir, Duke, Fargo, Humphreys, Odell, and McQueen. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
